column4: so, all: I narrowed my problem. I have this usb modem. What I need to make it work is to first "rmmod option" and then insert the usb stick. How can I do something like that when I insert the usb stick itself? Seems difficult but that will make the difference for the user, who just switched from windows.
googling for "option kernel module" is hard...
if I blacklist the module then it would not be inserted even when I insert the usb stick, right?
